idea: Building field service platform for Marine Service Industry. idea:
WE AT CHARTERX ARE A ONE-STOP SOLUTION FOR YOUR AIR CHARTER NEEDS.

Save yourself the hassle of chartering an aircraft by relying on our expertise & passion. We provide a comprehensive solution through our extensive fleet of Airplane (Passenger / Freight / Medical) and Helicopters (Passenger / Medical) across India and around the globe.

We bring the culmination of 20 years of experience & dedication to every flight every time, offering you tailor-made solutions to your travel needs, wherever and whenever. Our expertise lies precisely in our ability to understand our customers and identify their needs, setting these as our top priority.

We pride on our organization’s standard of service. CharterX strives hard to provide a memorable experience for its privileged clientele. Our attention-to-detail minded approach is dedicated to provide a seamless travel experience. We make it a priority to build and maintain relationships.

We specialize in acquisition & management of multitude of aircraft for events being the one point contact for our client. We provide complete Project Report & Scope of Operations for your detailed understanding.

CharterX provides more than transportation in a Private Aircraft, we provide an experience. It is our pleasure to arrange any special requests, in-flight customization, catering, and ground transportation as requested for. Whatever the requirements, we are available round the clock and devoted to meeting and exceeding your travel and lifestyle needs.

Lastly, as far as CharterX is concerned, safety is non-negotiable. Our clients put their trust in us because we live up to that trust.

Put yourself in great care and great service by getting in touch with our Team to book your next Charter flight.
name: CHARTERX LLP

idea: Wavylle.com is a book recommendation platform where readers get to make a list of their favorite books, share the list and make money whenever someone buys a book from that list.
name: Wavylle.com

idea:
Company name- The Little Green

Founded: May 2021, Mumbai

Category: Vertical Urban Farm (7000 plants hydroponic set up build in 1000 sq. ft. area).

The Little Green is a commercial Farming company that is focused onto growing a wide array of products, deliver superior flavor, better quality, and improved nutrition with the most sophisticated traceability and food safety levels in our industry.

Our Mission- Creating awareness throughout the generation with sustainable way of living and providing nutritious food to humans & promoting healthy lifestyle. The little green farm is focused onto maintaining a transparency between consumer and produce

  PROBLEM WORTH SOLVING

  With the increasing population there is a major decrease is the available arable land due to which the production of staple crops has been reduced.

  While globalization is also causing a huge effect on climate change and water scarcity.

  To meet the expectation of the increasing demand of the population the use of fertilizers and pesticides has been increased which is having adverse effects on the human health.

  At the current scenario availability of fresh organic product is very important.

OUR SOLUTION

  The Little Green choses the hydroponic farming method, wherein the arable space problem and water scarcity in India will be solved.

  25 varieties of leafy green vegetable, 50 varieties of microgreens, 8 types of mushrooms, 25 types of herbs will be grown, while reducing the consumption of soil and nullifying the use of fertilizer.

  This Urban hydroponic farms will reduce the carbon footprint of food and ensure a supply of fresh organic food throughout the year

  With this farm the consumer base will be close to the food producers knowing every details of the crops growth and shortens the supply chain

 

REVENUE

  Primary revenue will be generated by selling the microgreens. Growing over 50 varieties with 100 trays and generating a revenue of 75000 INR/harvest. Yearly there will be 24 harvest.

  Monthly subscriptions from over 1000 customers targeted with 1000 INR each.

  Fresh salad bowls expected income – 3,20,000 INR

  The 7000 plants leafy greens and herbs will be harvested every 3months making upto 3,50,000 INR

  With 100 bags of Mushroom we will make 3,20,000 INR per year EXPENSES

  The system costs is 27 lakhs

  Operating cost is 2lakh per month that includes –

Packaging cost and marketing

Seeds

Nutrients

Bills

  Yearly maintenance cost- 24 lakhs


  MILESTONES

  Farm aims for expanding the soilless farming using hydroponic and  Aquaponic method.

   To expand into new markets and enter new product categories with industry leading strategy.

   Expanding the new farms of 1000 to 10,000 sq ft indoor and 1 acre outdoor farm. Most of the farms will be setup in Kalburgi district, Karnataka due to less water availability.

   Plan for setting up upto 10 acre farm for 2022


       TEAM AND KEY ROLES

Akshay Arjun Lokhande

  -Chief Operating Officer

  -Sales and Marketing Executive

  -Crop (Vegetable) Cultivation Manager / Supervisor

Priyanka Pradeep Patil

  -General Farm Manager

 - Administrator / Accountant

  -Crop (Vegetable) Cultivation Manager / Supervisor

  -Front Desk Officer
name: The Little Green
